SELECT a.node_name nodeName, b.cell_name cellName, b.alarm_time alarmTime, c.level alarmLevelId, b.alarm_name_id alarmNameId, b.mo FROM unicom_node_wcdma a LEFT JOIN unicom_alarm_wcdma b ON a.node_name=b.node_name LEFT JOIN unicom_quota_history_node_wcdma c ON b.node_name=c.name WHERE a.group_name = #{groupName} ORDER BY NOW() LIMIT 1
